name: Odd-Eyes Arc Pendulum Dragon
effectText: Made from miracles, this valiant and beautiful dragon has gleaming eyes that reflect an arc drawn in the sky.
pendEffect: If an "Odd-Eyes" card(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Odd-Eyes" monster from your hand, Deck, or GY. You can only use this effect of "Odd-Eyes Arc Pendulum Dragon" once per turn.
